p: Clerodendrum volubile leaves were obtained from local farmers at Ifon, Ondo State, Nigeria. The leaves were assigned a voucher number, UBH C284 after identification and authentication by Dr. Henry Akinbosun at the Herbarium, Department of Botany, University of Benin, Benin City, Nigeria. The leaves were air-dried to minimize loss of volatiles and light-sensitive compounds (Thamkaew et al., 2020) before blending to fine powder and stored in a zip-lock bag at room temperature until further analysis (2â€‰days).
